thread.title: VOLLEYBALL: Clarksville suffers tough loss at Scottsburg
thread.title_full: VOLLEYBALL: Clarksville suffers tough loss at Scottsburg

author: hanson.crafton@newsandtribune.com(Hanson Crafton)
title: VOLLEYBALL: Clarksville suffers tough loss at Scottsburg
text:
VOLLEYBALL: Clarksville suffers tough loss at Scottsburg By HANSON CRAFTON News and Tribune Posted on Oct 15, 2015 by Hanson Crafton 
SCOTTSBURG — After three hard fought sets against Scottsburg, Clarksville came up just short in all three Thursday. 
The Generals got off to a bad start and fell into a 20-9 hole in the first set. They battled back to make it a contest but still lost by four. 
In the second set, Clarksville was up 23-16 but had trouble closing out the set. The Warriors were able to battle back and take the final nine points of the set. 
The final set was close the entire time as the team traded leads. Scottsburg was able to close it out and finish the sweep with a 28-26 triumph. 
“This time of year, you have to finish,” Clarksville coach John McEwen said. “Scottsburg just capitalized when they needed to and we were unable to finish.” 
Carolyn Hawkins had a strong match for the Generals. She finished with 11 kills and 15 digs. Kaelyn Gibson finished with eight kills and four aces. Chey Bledsoe led the team with 27 assists. 
SCOTTSBURG 3, CLARKSVILLE 0 
Scottsburg 25 25 28 
CLARKSVILLE STATISTICS 
Kills: Carolyn Hawkins 11, Kennedy Wagner 10, Kaelyn Gibson 8; Assists: Chey Bledsoe 27; Aces: Gibson 4, Kaitlyn Page 2, Bailey Sharp 2; Blocks: Hawkins 2; Digs: Hawkins 15. 
Records: 16-13.
